sentences.en: Constant wheelchair use will scuff almost any floor surface.
sentences.cn: 任何地板上经常有轮椅走动几乎都会有所磨损。

sentences.en: Grant: I just can't get this floor clean! There are scuff marks all over it!
sentences.cn: 葛兰: 我就是没办法把地板清乾净! 到处都是磨损的痕迹!

sentences.en: He seized Smith by the scuff of the neck and kicked him vaguely.
sentences.cn: 他抓住史密斯的头颈,拼命地踢他.

sentences.en: If you scuff ( your feet ) like that, you'll wear the heels out.
sentences.cn: 你那 麽 拖着脚走路, 就要把鞋跟磨坏了.

sentences.en: If you scuff like that, you'll wear the heels out.
sentences.cn: 你那么拖着脚走路, 就要把鞋跟磨坏了.

sentences.en: Polly, bewildered and embarrassed, dropped her head and scuffed her feet.
sentences.cn: 波莉既困惑又尴尬，低下头拖着脚走开了。

sentences.en: Scuff marks from shoes are difficult to remove.
Smooth away dead skin cells using our Lip Scuff before applying Wild Cherry Lip Butter.
sentences.cn: 先使用我们的唇部磨砂去除死皮,然后再涂上野艳樱桃唇乳霜滋润双唇.

sentences.en: Some scuff marks but very minors.
sentences.cn: 有些擦伤痕迹,但非常的未成年人.

sentences.en: The rear door scuff plate is attached with molded - in snap retainers.
sentences.cn: 后车门框板由模制 紧压 保持器连接.

sentences.en: Wear and scuff simulation tests, and measurement techniques, including condition monitoring.
sentences.cn: 磨损和胶合模拟实验以及测量技术, 包括实验条件的监测.

trans.tran_en: to walk in a slow lazy way, not lifting your feet up very high
